pages.text: While we rely on The Heart, The Heart also relies on us!$(br2)There are 9 lights below the roots of the tree showing her life force. Every hour, if at least one player is logged in, a light ticks off.

Feeding a single golden apple onto the target block will completely revive The Heart, causing her to gift you coins proportional to the number of lights restored.$(br2)$(l:patchouli:economy/blooming_weekend)Next Chapter$(/l)
